title: What’s wrong with child marriage?
content:
Child marriage puts the underage husband and wife at risk of many difficulties, especially for the girl.

Girls who get married before 18 years of age are much more likely to face violence from their husbands. Also, girls who get married underage are more likely to face problems associated with pregnancy and child birth. Getting underage boys and girls married, before they have the emotional and physical capabilities to handle life exposes them to risks that they would otherwise not face and robs them of their childhood.
